title: Pretty in pink, and purple, and red...
caption: Pretty in pink, and purple, and red...
desc: Azaleas in peak bloom are a stunning sight at the Magnolia Plantation and Gardens near Charleston in the US state of South Carolina. Together they create a vibrant forest of blooms spanning hundreds of native and hybrid varieties, including 15 azaleas once thought to be extinct.
